attributes.review: This app made my goat cry. Do you know how terrible you have to be to make a goat cry?!? Please don’t download this app. If I could give this a negative rating I would.
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: i was so quick to download this app of my loving president and couldn’t wait to show my full support of him. as soon as the app downloaded there was a jump scare from a massive cockroach. i have epilepsy and this triggered it and caused me to go to the doctor. please don’t download or your life will be on the line!
attributes.title: a cockroach jumped out of the screen 🙀

attributes.review: This app is literally ridiculous, it tried asking for my social security #, and where I lived. Do not download, it will give you nightmares.

When I opened it, it took me directly to an “adult website” dedicated to child indecency if you catch my drift, not saying I’m too surprised considering the views of the “man” the app is dedicated to.
attributes.title: dIsGuStInG

attributes.review: I got this app to learn more abt my president. But soon i learned how horrible he truly is. No one should get this app!! I would give it zero stars if i could!!!
attributes.title: The worst 🤢🤮

attributes.review: i got this app back in 2016 with high hopes but some racist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic, idiot, who happens to be a rapist, came in and ruined it all!! it takes photos of you from your camera and steals all ur info. such a bummer right? well it’s 2020 now and gen z, lets take back america and actually, make something good again
attributes.title: ruined my life !
One of the best apps i’ve ever used.

attributes.review: After downloading the app took all my information and I lost everything. 😭
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: Why would the app ask me for my phone number it’s ridiculous are they selling my info to the government
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review:
Absolutely horrible app 
Took a week to load and then deleted off my phone
attributes.title: Horrible
